briefdescription.para: end point associated with the list determine the best endpoint associated with the list of url and the params of the actual handle the returned endpoint need to be free after use

detaileddescription.para:
initiate a gfal's context with default parameters for use
a gfal_handle, need to be free after usage or NULL if errors

briefdescription.para: accessor for the default storage type definition

detaileddescription.para: parse a surl to check the validity

briefdescription.para: launch a surls-> turls translation in asynchronous mode

parameterdescription.para: : GList of string of the differents surls to convert

simplesect.para: return 0 if success else -1, check GError for more information

briefdescription.para: free a gfal's handle, safe if null
